pasugiya wasara 150 thula sarampa rogaya hethuwen lowa pura janathawa miliyana 200k pamana miyagos atha. 1954 di amarikanu jathika ekalos hawaridi dewid edmandsan nam rogi pirimi lamayage siruren labaganna lada wairasaya widyagnyayan wisin kukulu kalala madhyayaka wardhanaya karana ladi.

eewa thamayi an aya danagatha yuththe!
godanagillata mada sapayanno
‘ma raja heyin anek un men sarungal yawima yuthu nowe.
kagiso rabada, del steyin saha duaan oliwiyar suranga lakmalge pandu yawima desa neth yoma sitiya nam, owun me wana witath indiyanuwange paminima thek angili ganimin pasuwanu noanumanaya.
amarikawa thamayi me wasanawantha paribhogikaya.
“owunta nam monawa kalath madi…”
eya dayadayak se salakima sadarana wanne parampara gananak deshaye gaman manga surakshitha kala nisama pamanak nowe.

podu rajya mandalayiya
eeka mano widyathmaka prathikarayak.
"oowa therum ganna oya thama podyi" "oya deshapalana andabalayek" wage oona tharam udaharana denna puluwan.
mama ekak kiyami.
